Contributing to ProjectsÂ¶

This guide’s objective is to teach how to contribute to projects.

  1. Find or create an issue (Github Issues)
  2. Fork Repository
  3. Make changes.
  4. Submit a pull-request.
  5. Wait for comments and apply suggestions.
  6. Your code should be merged by now.
